com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

Class PortsEvaluationStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.PortsEvaluationStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfferEvaluationStage

    public class PortsEvaluationStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements OfferEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer for its port resources against an OfferRequirement. Individual port evaluations are handled by the children PortEvaluationStages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PortsEvaluationStage(java.util.Collection<OfferEvaluationStage> portEvaluationStages)

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool,
                                  PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: OfferEvaluationStage
        Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfos and org.apache.mesos.Protos.ExecutorInfo in the given OfferRequirement where appropriate to ensure they have necessary metadata (e.g. a populated environment variable), deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate OfferRecommendation in the given OfferRecommendationSlate if relevant.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface OfferEvaluationStage
        Parameters:
        mesosResourcePool - the available resources left available for this stage to consume
        podInfoBuilder - the grouping of all task and executor builders for the pod
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome describing whether this evaluation stage succeeded or failed, and why
